comprehensive_overview: LLDB is a powerful and modern debugger for C, C++, and Objective-C languages. It is part of the LLVM project and mainly used for debugging programs on macOS and iOS.
core_features: LLDB provides a rich set of features for debugging, including support for breakpoints, watchpoints, expression evaluation, scripting support with Python, a command-line interface, and integration with IDEs like Xcode.
